name: The Forgotten Four (Improvus - Game Development)
description:
The Forgotten Four is a metroidvania/JRPG fusion game where you control a bunch of mercenaries in a cyberpunk world.

In this game you'll play as Sanji, a former solider who has been turned into a mercenary involved on a mission to destroy the Braintech's devious plans.

You'll experience a 2D platform level explore combinated with classic JRPG tactical combat.

Developed by: Slobodianik Esteban Joel (Game Programmer), José Ángel Castañón Khan (Game Designer), Sol Monti (2D Artist) and Franco Ezequiel De'Leppeé (2D Artist).
